title: Please add a return to lobby button
body: We already lose lp and get a time penalty for dodging. Is it really necessary to make a player close out the client because they don't want to play a match with Blitzcrank jungle into an Udyr?

>
> Trolling is not punishable, this garbage system has shown it ages ago.

I have successfully reported trollers multiple times, so it is definitely punishable.

And dodging/leaving the lobby before a game starts will not solve our troll problem. If you dodge, then you're letting a troller go ruin another person's game, all while punishing yourself. It's just as bad as being the troll. So do us all a favor, and next time stick through it so you can actually make a difference and report the troll, rather than being a selfish bystander and pushing your problems onto other people.
I'd take 5 minutes over a (if lucky) 15 minute - 20 minute + wait

If you’re below Masters, anything can work.  Some people climb with the wildest things.  I find that most of the time, the reason a “troll pick” loses is because a teammate sees it and just gives up.

pfft even in the higher elo's anything can work. Sometimes you get so lucky and/or fed it doesnt matter until late game. here is the thing though while anything can work (just like you can be anything you want when you grow up) it doesnt mean its worth the effort vs Reward.
